name: No Time to Cook Chicken
author: SUE ANN
summary: Chicken, creamy soups, and sour cream in a slow cooker - cook all day, ready for you when you get home. Only 4 ingredients! Everyone loves this, a no hassle dinner good enough for company.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
directions: Place chicken breasts in a slow cooker
In a medium bowl, mix the cream of chicken soup and cream of celery soup until smooth Pour over the chicken, making sure it is well coated
Cover, and cook on Low heat for 7 to 8 hours
Stir in the sour cream about 1/2 hour before serving
